teams.name: FC Barcelona
teams.about: Founded in 1899 by a group of Swiss, Catalan, German, and English footballers led by Joan Gamper, FC Barcelona has become a symbol of Catalan culture and identity. The club is renowned for its attacking style of play and has achieved significant domestic and international success, including multiple UEFA Champions League titles.

teams.name: Real Madrid
teams.about: Established in 1902, Real Madrid is one of the most successful and widely supported football clubs globally. Known for their iconic all-white kits, Los Blancos have secured a record number of UEFA Champions League titles, solidifying their status as a dominant force in European football.

teams.name: Paris Saint-Germain
teams.about: Founded in 1970, Paris Saint-Germain has rapidly risen to prominence in French and European football. Based in Paris, the club has won numerous domestic league titles and has attracted top talents from around the world, aiming to establish itself as a European powerhouse.

teams.name: Celtic FC
teams.about: Founded in 1887, Celtic Football Club is a Scottish professional football club based in Glasgow. The club has won the Scottish league title 53 times, most recently in 2023, and is one of only five clubs in the world to have won over 100 trophies.

teams.name: Arsenal F.C
teams.about: Founded in 1886 as Dial Square by munitions workers in Woolwich, Arsenal adopted its current name in 1913 after relocating to North London. Known as 'The Gunners,' Arsenal is among England's most decorated clubs, boasting 13 league titles—including the iconic unbeaten 'Invincibles' season in 2003–04—and a record 14 FA Cup victories. The club has maintained top-flight status since 1919, the longest unbroken run in English football. With a global fan base estimated at over 100 million, Arsenal's influence extends beyond the pitch, embracing multiculturalism and fashion collaborations that resonate worldwide.

teams.name: West Ham United F.C
teams.about: Established in 1903, West Ham United F.C is known for its passionate fan base and resilient style of play. The club has won multiple La Liga titles and has been a consistent contender in European competitions, earning respect for its defensive solidity and teamwork.

teams.name: AC Milan
teams.about: Founded in 1899, Associazione Calcio Milan, commonly referred to as AC Milan, is one of Italy's most storied football clubs. The club has achieved significant success both domestically and internationally, with numerous Serie A and UEFA Champions League titles to their name.

teams.name: Juventus F.C
teams.about: Founded in 1897, Juventus Football Club is one of Italy's most successful and popular football teams. Based in Turin, the club has won numerous Serie A titles and has a strong European presence, known for their black and white striped kits.

teams.name: Borussia Dortmund
teams.about: Founded in 1909, Borussia Dortmund is renowned for its passionate supporters and vibrant yellow and black kits. The German club has won several Bundesliga titles and achieved European success, including a UEFA Champions League victory.

teams.name: AFC Ajax
teams.about: Founded in 1900, AFC Ajax is a Dutch professional football club based in Amsterdam. Known for their legendary youth academy and 'Total Football' philosophy, Ajax has won 36 Eredivisie titles and 4 European Cups/Champions Leagues, most recently in 1995.

teams.name: Galatasaray F.C
teams.about: Founded in 1905, Galatasaray is one of Turkey's most successful football clubs. Known for their passionate fans and iconic yellow-red colors, they have won numerous Süper Lig titles and the UEFA Cup in 2000.
